K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184a-0: @184a de nas bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184a-1: dang po re zhig dpyid zla tha chung gi dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bor song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184a-2: de nas nu ma'i bar du chu'i nang du nub par byas te 'dug la nyi ma la sngon du phyogs par yongs su brtags la ji snyed gnas kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184a-3: bza' ba thams cad spangs te nyon mongs shing smra bcad byas te nub bdun du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das ma'i thang sku yang dbu skra ma gtogs par gur gum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184a-5: tsandan gyis byug par bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184a-6: nub mo snga bar langs te chur khru bdun /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184a-7: zheng du khru bcu dang bcas pa la tshon sna ma lus pa gso sbyong dang ldan pa'i lha bzos bcom ldan 'das ma mdog ljang ser sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184a-8: phyag g-yas pa na 'bras bu chen po bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184a-9: phyag g-yon pa na sgrub pa po rnams la ster ba'i rin po che'i za ma tog mu tig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184a-11: bee d'urya'i 'bras bu can bsnams pa'i phyag dang ldan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184b-0: steng du lha'i bu rin po che char mngon du 'bebs @184b bzhin pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184b-1: g-yas logs su dpal chen mo padma'i phyag can sgrub pa po la nye bar dgongs pa la gnas bzhin pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184b-2: g-yon logs su padma'i dpa' rin po ches snyim pa gang ba bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184b-3: 'og tu sgrub pa po padma'i lag pa can bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184b-4: de nas thang sku sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du nub phyogs su kha bstan la bkram ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184b-5: de nas nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma ma gtogs pa mdzod kyi bzhes pa yang dbul zhing dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod pa chen po byas la tsandan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184b-6: aa ga ru'i bdug pas bsreg par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184b-7: zhun mar gyi mar me brgya 'bum 'bul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184b-8: de nas stan gcig la gnas la bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhal la dmigs la nub mo mtshan bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184b-9: de nas skya rengs shar ba'i dus su skyes bu chen po tsam gyi nor rin po che thams cad kyi rgyun 'bab cing khang ba gang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184b-10: yang na mtshan mo phyed na chu'i nang du zhugs la brgyad brgya bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184b-11: zla ba gcig tu gcig gi sbyor bas nor gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184b-12: mi shes par kha cig 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:184b-13: yang na rgyal po'i dkor mngon par 'dod na nyin mo chu'i nang du bzlas pa bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-1: mo'i phyed na til gyis sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-2: rgyal rigs las rnyed pa chen po thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-3: yungs kar mar la bsres nas sbyin sreg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-4: byas na; rgyal po dbang du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-5: kun tu ra'i sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-6: rgyal po'i blon po dbang du byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-8: sbyor ba gang gis mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das padma'i gdan can dran par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-10: yang na sgrub thabs chen po bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-11: cho 'phrul gyi dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te zas ci srid du bcad nas gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung na thang ga nub phyogs su bstan la dgram zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-12: nyin mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-13: mtshan mo stan gcig la gnas pas nub ya la gyis bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-14: nor gyi phung po chen po rnyed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-15: 'thor gnod byas kyang 'dzang bar mi 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-17: chog 'di'i cho 'phrul gyi dkar po'i phyogs la bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185a-19: bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma dngos su mthong zhing phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185b-0: ji ltar de @185b ltar tshangs spyod bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185b-1: kha na ma tho ba'i zas chang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185b-2: nya sha la sogs pa sbangs shing mtshan mo bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa kun dga' bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185b-5: zla ba bzang po yongs su dga' nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i don du gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-023:185b-6: bcom ldan 'das ma nor rgyun ma'i rtog pa rdzogs so ////
